title: Electrocatalytic hydrogenation of the formyl group and heteroaromatic ring in furfural on activated carbon cloth-supported ruthenium
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00260A, Paper
Open Access

Meheryar R. Kasad, James E. Jackson, Christopher M. Saffron
Electrocatalytic transformation of furfural to tetrahydrofurfuryl alcohol on activated carbon cloth-supported ruthenium at mild conditions (≤ 50 °C under atmospheric pressure) using hydrogen equivalents produced in situ by water splitting.
